name: Platformer-Adventures of Arthur
description:
A sample proyect to show my Unity and C# skills. Is a short prototype of a platformer game I made while practicing, I hope you enjoy my work and comment below any suggestions or observations.

Controls:
-ArrowKeys = Move
-Z = Melee Attack
-X = Jump
-C = Magic Attack
-Space = Ncp Talk
-Esc = Pause

Asset Kit used: https://craftpix.net/product/fantasy-platformer-game-kit-pixel-art
